introText:
WELCOME TO THE NINTENDO CLASSICS QUIZ!

TODAY WE'RE TESTING YOUR KNOWLEDGE OF THE GREATEST NINTENDO GAMES AND CONSOLES. ARE YOU READY TO PROVE YOUR MASTERY OF GAMING HISTORY?

questions.question: Which Nintendo character made their debut in the 1981 arcade game 'Donkey Kong'?
In what year was the original Nintendo Entertainment System (NES) released in North America?
Put these Nintendo consoles in order of release, earliest first:
What is the name of Mario's dinosaur companion who debuted in Super Mario World?
Which of these games was NOT included in Super Mario All-Stars?

introText:
WELCOME TO THE GOLDEN AGE OF ARCADES!

PREPARE YOURSELF FOR A JOURNEY BACK TO THE NEON-LIT ARCADES OF THE 1980s. HOW MANY QUARTERS WOULD YOU HAVE SPENT TO MASTER THESE CLASSICS?

questions.question: Which company created Pac-Man?
Arrange these arcade games in order of release, earliest first:
How many ghosts chase Pac-Man in the original arcade game?
What color is the highest-point alien ship in Space Invaders?
Which of these games did NOT use a joystick as its main control?

introText:
GET READY FOR SEGA GENESIS TRIVIA!

DOES SEGA STILL DO WHAT NINTENDON'T? TEST YOUR KNOWLEDGE OF THE 16-BIT CONSOLE WARS ERA AND PROVE YOU'RE A TRUE GENESIS DOES!

questions.question: What was Sonic the Hedgehog's original name during development?
Put these Sonic games in order of release, earliest first:
How many buttons were on the original Genesis/Mega Drive controller?
What was the name of the Genesis add-on that allowed CD games to be played?
Which of these was NOT a playable character in Streets of Rage 2?

introText:
WELCOME TO PLAYSTATION HISTORY!

THE ORIGINAL PLAYSTATION CHANGED GAMING FOREVER. LET'S SEE IF YOU REMEMBER THE REVOLUTION THAT STARTED IT ALL!

questions.question: The PlayStation was originally meant to be an add-on for which console?
What was the price of the PlayStation at launch in the US (in USD)?
Put these PlayStation classics in order of release, earliest first:
What was the name of the PlayStation's memory card unit (in MB)?
Which character was NOT a playable fighter in the original Tekken?
